original_title: HNBA expands footprint; revamped Kandy and new Galewala branch now open to the public
original_body_lines: HNB Assurance’s commitment to delivering seamless access to comprehensive insurance solutions for customers across the country reached yet another milestone, with the unveiling of the refurbished Kandy branch and the new branch in Galewala. This strategic expansion represents the significant growth HNBA has displayed over the past couple of years.

The refurbished branch in Kandy, located in the heart of the city, has been designed, keeping in mind modern aesthetics to enhance greater customer experience. Additionally, the new branch will cater to the insurance requirements of individuals, families and businesses in Galewala, targeting the exploration of a new market and offering customised solutions to meet the unique needs of those local communities.

Speaking about the branch openings, HNB Assurance CEO Lasitha Wimalaratne expressed his delight about the expansion, stating, “We are excited to open our refurbished model branch in Kandy and our new branch in Galewala. These strategic initiatives reflect our commitment to strengthening our presence across Sri Lanka and improving accessibility to our wide range of insurance products. We believe that by expanding our physical presence, we can better serve our customers and provide them with the personalised attention and support they require.”

HNBA Advisor Distribution Channel Chief Business Officer / GM Harindra Ramasinghe, emphasised the company’s focus on reach and customer-centricity, stating, “At HNB Assurance, we always strive to put our customers first. The opening of these new branches are a validation of our service mindset and efforts to conduct our operations in the most convenient and efficient manner. We are confident that our expanded network will help us build stronger relationships with our customers and foster a deeper understanding of their insurance needs. I invite the people of Kandy and Galewala to visit and engage with us to experience the exceptional service standards of HNBA.”
